message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The submucosal glands of Brunner are located in the duodenum, so it is likely that the biopsy was taken from this portion of the bowel.
We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Submucosal glands of Brunner are present in the duodenum. Therefore, the most likely portion of the bowel that was biopsied is the duodenum.
